quotes.quote: There is only one kind of shock worse than the totally unexpected: the expected for which one has refused to prepare.
Shock is a funny thing. Things get both sharp and fuzzy. Time stretches and distorts. Things come rushing into focus and seem larger than they are. Other things vanish to a single point.
Hope for the best, be prepared for the worse. Life is shocking, but you must never appear to be shocked. For no matter how bad it is it could be worse and no matter how good it is it could be better.
Nobody sets out to offend or shock for the sake of shocking. You set out to get laughs.
Your spirit must be strong to survive a shock.
Don't worry, keep at it, you will soon shock the world”
Sometimes the only way to make palatable that which is appalling and apprehensive is to season it with some humor.
What is this life but the sound of an appalling love.
There is nothing more shocking than to see assertion and approval dashing ahead of cognition and perception.
You will be old-fashioned one day. It's more shocking than getting old.
The fact that people are shocked is the best proof that they need shocking.
That's what art is, shocking people. Sometimes shocking yourself.
Every new truth begins in a shocking heresy.
Every moment is a new and shocking transvaluation of all we have ever been.
The waste of life occasioned by trying to do too many things at once is appalling.
It's sometimes shocking to find out what people really believe in.
Being comfortable with the norm can make changes come as a shock.
When two people unite, kindness must be mutual, or shocking things will happen.
